hotspots.title: Task Columns
hotspots.bodyMd:
**What you're seeing:** Kanban board with Backlog, Active, Done, and Delayed columns.

**Why it matters:** Visual task tracking that syncs with Claude Tasks.

- Drag tasks between columns
- Auto-sync with Claude's task system
- Priority indicators + timestamps
- Evidence chain linking to worklogs

hotspots.title: + New Task
hotspots.bodyMd:
**What you're seeing:** Create new task button.

**Why it matters:** Tasks drive the entire workflow.

- Creates tracked task with unique ID
- Links to checkpoints and worklogs
- Visible in desktop monitor

hotspots.title: Worker Grid
hotspots.bodyMd:
**What you're seeing:** Leader and Worker terminals arranged in a collapsible grid.

**Why it matters:** Parallel AI execution with full PTY access.

- Leader coordinates workers
- Each worker has dedicated PTY
- Collapsible panels for focus
- Status indicators per terminal

hotspots.title: Active Terminal
hotspots.bodyMd:
**What you're seeing:** Currently selected worker's terminal output.

**Why it matters:** Full shell access and real-time streaming.

- Real-time output streaming
- Claude Code integration
- Plan mode indicators
- Message input at bottom

hotspots.title: Controls Panel
hotspots.bodyMd:
**What you're seeing:** Traffic monitoring controls.

**Why it matters:** Full control over visualization.

- Pause/Reset traffic view
- Graph or Split view modes
- Flat or Tree layout
- Security test alerts

hotspots.title: Gateway Graph
hotspots.bodyMd:
**What you're seeing:** Real-time API traffic visualization.

**Why it matters:** See all LLM interactions at a glance.

- Gateway as central hub
- Connected agent nodes
- Request/response flow
- Live activity indicators

hotspots.title: System Status
hotspots.bodyMd:
**What you're seeing:** Real-time system metrics.

**Why it matters:** Instant health overview.

- Requests per second
- Average latency
- Error rate
- Total request count

hotspots.title: Quick Actions
hotspots.bodyMd:
**What you're seeing:** System tray companion app.

**Why it matters:** Always-available shortcuts.

- Screenshot capture
- Quick task creation
- Session status at a glance
- One-click recording start

hotspots.title: Status Indicators
hotspots.bodyMd:
**What you're seeing:** Live status information.

**Why it matters:** Know what's happening at a glance.

- Active agents count
- Recording status
- Gateway connection
- LMStudio status

hotspots.title: Agent Management
hotspots.bodyMd:
**What you're seeing:** Active agents and their status.

**Why it matters:** Central control for all AI agents.

- View all active agents
- Monitor agent health
- Start/stop agents
- View agent logs

hotspots.title: Tool Browser
hotspots.bodyMd:
**What you're seeing:** Available MCP tools and integrations.

**Why it matters:** Full visibility into agent capabilities.

- 40+ registered tools
- MCP integrations
- Permission management
- Tool documentation
